## MosaicStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [MosaicStore](./lib-base.mosaicstore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MosaicStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.mosaicstore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./lib-base.mosaicstorelistenerparams.newstate.md) | [MosaicStoreState](./lib-base.mosaicstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
|  [oldState](./lib-base.mosaicstorelistenerparams.oldstate.md) | [MosaicStoreState](./lib-base.mosaicstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire new state. |
